resources.string: You will lose stored game state, are you sure want to start new game ?
It is recommended to restart application.

This application uses sounds from freesound.org.
License notes are available here:
https://www.freesound.org
Sounds were renamed for more convenient implementation of this application.Here is the list of attribution for all sounds:
